title: There are no articles related to this problem in the help section
content: Hello  I have read all the recovery related articles in the help section of the site and if there was a way to recover, I have tested it. I ask my question once again:  How is it possible that after I log in to Mozilla Firefox and sync my account, instead of recovering the information, all of it is deleted from other connected devices as well? I didn't even have time to make any changes in the sync menu and my account, and as soon as the sync was done, instead of recovering the information on the device that I had just synced, the information was deleted from my old devices such as my Android mobile phone, without my intervention. This is a very big and important problem and rest assured that there is no explanation in the help section about this. Please understand the problem and refrain from sending me links to re-read all the articles I've read.
creator: m.yosefpour82

title: Taskbar problems
content: Is anyone else having this issue? The top right of the task bar is supposed to offer the chance to minimize or close the window, with an underscore and an x, ans well to to pop out the window with the two rectangles, one behind and above the other. Mine no longer show up on Firefox, and I can't figure out how to bring them back, if it is even possible.

title: Firefox does not save recent browsing history nor autocompletes/suggests regularly visited urls
content: As said. As of 11.11 Firefox does not save all visited websites nor autocompletes while typing a url on the search bar like before. I've checked the options are marked, restarted the computer and started Firefox with troubleshooting mode but it still persists. I've only have some websites from now and the rest is from +7 days old. I think it also happens with recently closed tabs as not all show there.
